articles.author: Avery Schmitz, Isaac Yee, Teele Rebane, Helen Regan
articles.title: Hero officer who took down Bondi shooter praised as footage reveals how massacre was brought to an end - CNN
articles.description: Videos from the tragedy give a clearer picture of how the antisemitic attack unfolded and how an officer, armed only with a handgun, moved in to take out the attackers from 45 meters (150 feet) away – helping to end Australia’s worst mass shooting in almost 3…
articles.content: A police officer hailed as a hero for shooting dead one of the attackers responsible for the Bondi Beach massacre has been identified by Australian media as Detective Senior Constable Cesar Barraza.… [+6908 chars]
